trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the confirmation handler of a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet som brukes til å starte behandlingsprogrammet for bekreftelse av eksplisitt en <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> som inneholder den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>for denne <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"> </xref> aktiviteten.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity explicitly invokes the confirmation handler of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.
trans-unit.target: Når målet for den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>er angitt, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>aktiviteten eksplisitt aktiverer behandlingsprogrammet bekreftelse av <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>som returnerer <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity executes the default confirmation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: Når målet for den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>ikke er angitt, den <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm>aktiviteten utfører bekreftelse for alle underordnede <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>aktiviteter i omvendt rekkefølge av vellykket.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the Target refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>oppstår hvis målet refererer til en <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>som tidligere ble bekreftet eller kompensere.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er angitt under kjøring en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>oppstår.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Confirm"></xref> activity.
